import { Button, makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {Avatar, Card, CardContent, Grid, Typography} from '@material-ui/core' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme)=>({ root:{ margin:theme.spacing(1), flexGrow:theme.spacing(1) }, fields:{ padding:theme.spacing(2), display:'flex', justifyContent:'space-between' }, })) const ListSSA = ({ssa}) => { const classes = useStyles() return (
{ssa.name[0]} {ssa.name} {ssa.Arret.length} {ssa.auteur} {ssa.date_de_creation}
); } export default ListSSA;
